TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 在 SQL Server 資料庫中，管理 ASP.NET 應用程式成員資格資訊的存放。

span.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別由和提供 ASP.NET 應用程式使用 SQL Server 資料庫的成員資格服務的類別。This class is used by the and classes to provide membership services for an ASP.NET application using a SQL Server database. 您無法使用未搭配 SQL Server。You cannot use a without SQL Server. SQL Server Express 安裝預設執行個體名稱和使用者執行個體已啟用，您的電腦何時物件會建立名為的資料庫`aspnetdb`應用程式的`App_Data`目錄第一次應用程式會執行。When your computer has SQL Server Express installed with the default instance name and user-instancing enabled, the object will create a database called `aspnetdb` in the application's `App_Data` directory the first time the application is run. 若要以手動方式建立資料庫，執行`Aspnet_regsql.exe`可執行檔中找到`%systemroot%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ versionNumber`資料夾，並指定`-A m`選項 (例如`aspnet_regsql.exe -A m`)。To manually create the database, run the `Aspnet_regsql.exe` executable found in the `%systemroot%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ versionNumber` folder and specify the `-A m` option (for example `aspnet_regsql.exe -A m`). 建立的資料庫稱為 Aspnetdb。The database created is called Aspnetdb. 或者，執行`Aspnet_regsql.exe`提取 GUI 組態模式啟動，並選擇設定所有的 ASP.NET 功能。Alternatively, run `Aspnet_regsql.exe` to pull up the GUI configuration mode and choose to configure all ASP.NET Features. 如果成員資格提供者設定為使用整合式的安全性的連接字串，ASP.NET 應用程式的處理序帳戶必須具有連線到 SQL Server 資料庫權限。If the membership provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. Machine.config 檔案中定義預設值執行個體名為`AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`連接至本機電腦上的預設 SQL Server Express 執行個體。The Machine.config file defines a default instance named `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider` that connects to the default SQL Server Express instance on the local machine. 如果您安裝 SQL Server Express 預設執行個體名稱，或您可以在 Web.config 檔案中定義您自己的執行個體，讓 ASP.NET 應用程式，您可以使用提供者的這個執行個體。You can use this instance of the provider if you installed SQL Server Express with the default instance name, or you can define your own instance in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 如果您設定`passwordCompatMode`屬性設定為，應用程式可以使用的雜湊，以及加密成員資格選項，在 ASP.NET 4 中所新增。If you set the `passwordCompatMode` attribute to , the application can use the hashing and encryption membership options that were added in ASP.NET 4. 不過，如果`passwordCompatMode`屬性設為，只有雜湊及加密成員資格選項，從 ASP.NET 2.0 中，ASP.NET 3.5 中，可以使用 ASP.NET 3.5 SP1。However, if the `passwordCompatMode` attribute is set to , only the hashing and encryption membership options from the ASP.NET 2.0, ASP.NET 3.5, and ASP.NET 3.5 SP1 can be used. 預設值是 。The default value is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示設定為使用 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a . ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由群組的使用者資訊。The is used by the to group user information. 限定名稱與應用程式名稱的使用者資訊，您可以在單一資料庫中儲存多個應用程式的資訊不會重複的使用者名稱之間發生衝突。By qualifying user information with an application name, you can store information for multiple applications in a single database without running into conflicts between duplicate user names. 此外，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式時，可以藉由指定相同的值中使用相同的使用者資料庫屬性。Also, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 屬性可以設定以程式設計的方式，或是可以設定以宣告方式將 Web 應用程式的組態檔中`applicationName`屬性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application with the `applicationName` attribute. 如果未指定值`applicationName`Web 應用程式組態檔中的屬性則使用應用程式所做的第一個要求的屬性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the first request made to the application is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因為單一的預設成員資格提供者執行個體用來提供所要求的所有物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default membership provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入與變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 我們建議您避免撰寫程式碼，以讓使用者能夠設定屬性除非必要，否則。We recommend that you avoid writing code to allow users to set the property unless you must. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要管理多個應用程式的成員資格資料的系統管理應用程式。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages membership data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該是單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體和集合至`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別，以更新的 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的使用者的密碼。This method is called by the class to update the password for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 密碼長度上限為 128 個字元。The maximum password length is 128 characters. 如果不正確的密碼提供給方法中，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者遭到鎖定且無法登入，直到呼叫，以清除鎖定狀態方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供了正確的密碼，且使用者目前並未遭到鎖定，則內部的計數器，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試重設為零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以呼叫直接方法首先取得的參考執行個體透過屬性類別。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance through the property of the class. 屬性會公開`defaultProvider`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中指定。The property exposes the `defaultProvider` specified in the Web.config file for the application. 設定不會參考使用的預設提供者的提供者屬性。Configured providers that are not the default provider referenced using the property. 您也可以藉由變更使用者密碼方法。You can also change user passwords by using the method. 中所有參數值的開頭和尾端空白會被去除。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會修改指定之使用者的密碼。The following code example modifies the password for the specified user. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用的屬性類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the property of the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別來更新密碼問題和解答，以便在 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的使用者。This method is called by the class to update the password question and answer for a user in the SQL Server database that is specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 使用中指定的格式來加密的密碼解答屬性。The password answer is encrypted using the format that is specified in the property. 需要密碼問題和答案提供一層額外的安全性時擷取，或重設使用者的密碼。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when retrieving or resetting a user's password. 建立使用者名稱時，使用者可以提供一組問題和解答，稍後可用來擷取或重設遺忘的密碼。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to retrieve or reset a forgotten password. 方法更新密碼問題和成員資格使用者的回應。The method updates the password question and answer for a membership user. 如果不正確的密碼提供給方法中，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試次數都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counters that track invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者遭到鎖定且無法登入，藉由呼叫清除鎖定狀態之前方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by calling the method. 如果提供了正確的密碼，且使用者目前並未遭到鎖定，則內部的計數器，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試重設為零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 密碼問題的最大長度為 256 個字元。The maximum length for the password question is 256 characters. 密碼解答的最大長度為 128 個字元。The maximum length for the password answer is 128 characters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱、和。For more information, see , , and . 中所有參數值的開頭和尾端空白會被去除。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會更新密碼問題和使用者的回應。The following code example updates the password question and answer for a user. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用的屬性類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the property of the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別，以在 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中建立新的使用者。This method is called by the class to create a new user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file. 會將新的使用者識別已設定。New users are identified with the configured . 如果屬性設定為`true`，並`null`或空字串 ("") 指定`email`參數，建立使用者將會失敗。If the property is set to `true`, and `null` or an empty string ("") is specified for the `email` parameter, the user creation will fail. 如果使用者建立也會失敗屬性設定為`true`和指定的值`email`參數是設定的資料庫中現有的使用者之電子郵件地址重複。The user creation will also fail if the property is set to `true` and the value specified for the `email` parameter is a duplicate of the email address for an existing user in the database for the configured . 使用者名稱的最大長度為 256 個字元。The maximum length for the user name is 256 characters. 電子郵件地址的最大長度為 256 個字元。The maximum length for the email address is 256 characters. 以純文字，或之後進行雜湊或加密的密碼的最大長度為 128 個字元。The maximum length for the password in clear text or after it has been hashed or encrypted is 128 characters. 其他會造成失敗的使用者建立的條件：Other conditions that will cause user creation to fail: - `password`參數是`null`，或於修剪後的為空字串。The `password` parameter is `null`, or an empty string after trimming. - 長度`password`參數是在指定的值小於屬性。The length of the `password` parameter is less than the value specified in the property. - 中的非字母字元數目`password`參數是在指定的值小於屬性。The number of non-alphabetic characters in the `password` parameter is less than the value specified in the property. - `password`參數未通過中的規則運算式屬性。The `password` parameter does not pass the regular expression in the property. - 自訂的密碼驗證程式碼取消期間的使用者建立事件。Custom password-validation code canceled user creation during the event. - 屬性是`true`並`passwordAnswer`參數為`null`或於修剪後的為空字串。The property is `true` and the `passwordAnswer` parameter is either `null` or an empty string after trimming. - `passwordAnswer` 參數為空字串。The `passwordAnswer` parameter is an empty string. - `passwordAnswer`參數的長度超過 128 個字元。The `passwordAnswer` parameter is longer than 128 characters. - 屬性是`true`和密碼的問題是`null`或於修剪後的為空字串。The property is `true` and the password question is either `null` or an empty string after trimming. - `passwordQuestion` 參數為空字串。The `passwordQuestion` parameter is an empty string. - `passwordQuestion`參數的長度超過 256 個字元。The `passwordQuestion` parameter is longer than 256 characters. - `providerUserKey`參數設定為型別的物件以外的其他。The `providerUserKey` parameter set to an object of a type other than . - `providerUserKey`參數是現有的使用者金鑰的複本。The `providerUserKey` parameter is a duplicate of an existing user key. - `username`參數是現有的使用者名稱重複。The `username` parameter is a duplicate of an existing user name. 開頭和尾端空白會刪減所有字串參數值。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all string parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的使用者設定為使用表單驗證的 ASP.NET 應用程式和。The following code example creates a new user for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and the . 如果未成功建立使用者，就是向使用者顯示訊息。If the user is not created successfully, a message is displayed to the user. 否則，將使用者重新導向的應用程式的登入頁面。Otherwise, the user is redirected to the sign-in page for the application. > [!NOTE] > 此範例會呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`的 Web.config 檔案中使用類別。This sample calls the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file using the class. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別，以移除 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的使用者。This method is called by the class to remove a user from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file. 已刪除的使用者只會刪除從已設定。Deleted users are only deleted from the configured . 如果`deleteAllRelatedData`設定為`true`，然後儲存的所有使用者資料的資料庫中， ，或個人化功能，也會刪除已設定。If `deleteAllRelatedData` is set to `true`, then all user data stored in the database for the , , or personalization features is also deleted for the configured . 如果不存在的成員資格使用者，這是在資料庫中，並`deleteAllRelatedData`是`true`，然後相關的資料和儲存的使用者資訊， ，或個人化功能將仍然會刪除應用程式中指定屬性。If the membership user does not exist in the database, and `deleteAllRelatedData` is `true`, then the related data and the user information stored for the , , or personalization features will still be deleted for the application specified in the property. 如此一來，方法可用來快速刪除使用者的相關資訊，即使物件不用來儲存已驗證的使用者資訊。As a result, the method can be used for quickly deleting information related to a user, even when the object is not used for storing authenticated user information. 會修剪 `username` 參數值中的前置空格和後端空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會刪除目前登入的使用者。The following code example deletes the currently logged-on user. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 密碼重設可讓成員資格提供者，來取代目前的使用者名稱密碼與新，隨機產生的密碼。Password reset allows the membership provider to replace the current password for a user name with a new, randomly generated password. 這會特別有用的時機屬性設定為，因為使用者無法擷取雜湊的密碼值。This is especially useful when the property is set to , as users cannot retrieve hashed password values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體，而且可讓您的密碼重設。It specifies the application's instance and enables password reset. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為，使用者將無法擷取資料庫中的現有密碼。If the property is set to , a user will not be able to retrieve his or her existing password from the database. 密碼格式提供單向密碼值的編碼方式。The password format provides one-way encoding of password values. 密碼是隨機產生的 salt 值進行雜湊，且相較於儲存在資料庫中進行驗證的值。Passwords are hashed with a randomly generated salt value and compared to values stored in the database for authentication. 雜湊的值不能解除編碼，以擷取原始的密碼值。Hashed values cannot be unencoded to retrieve the original password value. 如果屬性設定為，並設定為`true`、初始化提供者時，會擲回。If the property is set to , and is set to `true`, a is thrown when the provider is initialized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體，並可讓密碼擷取。It specifies the application's instance and enables password retrieval. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回包含相符項目與所提供之電子郵件地址的成員資格使用者的清單`emailToMatch`已設定。 returns a list of membership users in which the email address contains a match with the supplied `emailToMatch` for the configured . 比對的使用者名稱搜尋`emailToMatch`使用 LIKE 子句的參數值。The searches for a user name that matches the `emailToMatch` parameter value, using the LIKE clause. SQL Server 萬用字元可以包含在參數值。SQL Server wildcard characters can be included in the parameter value. 比方說，如果`emailToMatch`參數設定為"address@example.com"，然後電子郵件地址的使用者資訊 」address@example.com"會傳回，如果有的話。For example, if the `emailToMatch` parameter is set to "address@example.com", then information for users with the email address "address@example.com" is returned, if it exists. 如果`emailToMatch`參數設定為"%@example.com"，然後電子郵件地址的使用者資訊 」address@example.com"，"address2@example.com"，"admin@example.com"等會傳回。If the `emailToMatch` parameter is set to "%@example.com", then information for users with the email address "address@example.com", "address2@example.com", "admin@example.com", and so on is returned. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回，其中的零識別的第一頁的結果。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為 已設定的成員資格使用者總數`applicationName`。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users for the configured `applicationName`. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`的值為 1`pageSize`為 5，傳回會包含第 6 到第 10 位使用者傳回。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through tenth users returned. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. 會修剪 `emailToMatch` 參數值中的前置空格和後端空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `emailToMatch` parameter value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來擷取成員資格使用者資訊並顯示結果頁面中的資料。The following code example uses the method to retrieve membership user information and displays the results in pages of data. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. summary.span: 產生至少有 14 個字元長的隨機密碼。

span.span: Generates a random password that is at least 14 characters long.

span.span: A random password that is at least 14 characters long.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法，以產生密碼，以指定的大小與至少指定的非字母的字元數。The class provides a method, which generates a password of a specified size with at least the specified number of non-alphabetic characters. 方法呼叫方法類別來擷取至少 14 個字元長的隨機密碼。The method of the calls the method of the class to retrieve a random password that is at least 14 characters long. 如果屬性大於 14、 傳回的密碼將會在指定的長度屬性。If the property is greater than 14, the password returned will be the length specified in the property. 您可以特別呼叫方法，藉由參考直接從類別屬性類別。You can specifically call the method by referencing the class directly from the property of the class. 產生的密碼只能包含英數字元及下列標點符號： `!@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?`。The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: `!@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?`. 沒有隱藏或非可列印的控制字元會包含在產生的密碼。No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password. > [!NOTE] > 藉由建立隨機密碼方法不保證傳遞中的規則運算式屬性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 不過，隨機的密碼將會符合所建立的準則和屬性。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會產生隨機的 10 個字元密碼。The following code example generates a random 10-character password. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別來擷取從 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫的使用者資訊。This method is called by the class to retrieve user information from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回，其中的零識別的第一頁的結果。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為 已設定的成員資格使用者總數`applicationName`。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users for the configured `applicationName`. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`的值為 1`pageSize`為 5，傳回會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個使用者。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳回一份使用者的使用者數目的計數資料頁面中目前在線上。The following code example returns a list of users in pages of data with a count of the number of users currently online. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別從 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中擷取使用者的密碼。This method is called by the class to retrieve the password for a user from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 如果不正確的密碼回應提供給方法中，追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者遭到鎖定且無法登入，直到呼叫，以清除鎖定狀態方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供了正確的密碼解答，且使用者目前並未遭到鎖定，則會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試的內部計數器會重設為零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以呼叫直接方法首先取得的參考執行個體透過屬性類別。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance through the property of the class. 如果屬性設定為，則方法無法擷取密碼。If the property is set to , the method cannot retrieve the password. 雜湊的密碼單向加密，且無法解密。Hashed passwords are encrypted one-way and cannot be decrypted. 如果屬性設定為，並設定為`true`、初始化提供者時，會擲回。If the property is set to , and is set to `true`, a is thrown when the provider is initialized. 中所有參數值的開頭和尾端空白會被去除。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取指定的使用者名稱密碼，並將它傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息。The following code example retrieves the password for a specified user name and sends it to the user in an email message. > [!NOTE] > 適用於需要高的安全性層級的網站，不建議使用電子郵件以純文字傳回密碼。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 高安全性的網站，我們建議您傳回使用加密，例如 SSL 密碼。For high-security sites, we recommend that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!NOTE] > 此範例會呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`在 Web.config 檔案中使用類別。This sample calls the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file by using the class. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. summary.span: 取得鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數。

span.span: Gets the number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

value.span: 鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數。

span.span: The number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可搭配防範不必要的來源，猜測密碼或密碼解答的重複嘗試透過成員資格使用者。The works in conjunction with the to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 無效的密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題的數目是否大於或等於值屬性的值所識別的分鐘數內屬性，則成員資格使用者藉由設定鎖定屬性，以`true`直到使用者解除鎖定使用方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the value of the property within the number of minutes identified by the value of the property, then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked with the method. 如果之前提供有效的密碼，則達到值時，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試次數的計數器會重設為零。If a valid password is supplied before the value is reached, the counters that track the number of invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如果之前提供有效的密碼解答達到值時，只會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試次數的計數器會重設為零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the value is reached, only the counter that tracks the number of invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 分別保留無效的密碼嘗試次數和無效的密碼解答嘗試次數的計數。The keeps counts of invalid password attempts and invalid password-answer attempts separately. 無效的密碼嘗試會導致只嘗試密碼計數器遞增。Invalid password attempts result in only the password-attempt counter being incremented. 無效的密碼解答嘗試會導致只有密碼解答計數器遞增。Invalid password-answer attempts result in only the password-answer counter being incremented. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中使用`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`組態區段的屬性。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the configuration section. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體，並設定`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`屬性設定為五個的無效嘗試和`passwordAttemptWindow`30 分鐘的時間。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

span.span: The time window, in minutes, during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or password answers are tracked.
The default is 10 minutes.

value.span: 如果目前失敗嘗試與上一次失敗嘗試之間的時間間隔超過 屬性設定，則會將每次失敗嘗試都視為初次失敗嘗試。

span.span: If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, each failed attempt is treated as if it were the first failed attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配屬性，以協助您抵禦猜測密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者執行不必要的來源的重複嘗試。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or the password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 當使用者嘗試登入、 變更其密碼，或重設其密碼時，只有特定數目的連續嘗試可以在指定的時間範圍內。When users are attempting to log in, change their password, or reset their password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 所指定的時間間隔長度屬性，識別允許的無效嘗試之間的分鐘數。The length of the time window is specified by the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果連續失敗次數，可讓使用者重設他或她的密碼等於中儲存的值屬性，而時間後所經過的最後一個的無效嘗試小於指定的分鐘數屬性，則成員資格使用者遭到鎖定 splittunneling屬性設`true`。If the number of consecutive failed attempts that a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified for the property, then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true`. 使用者可以藉由呼叫來解除鎖定方法。The user can be unlocked by calling the method. 如果目前失敗的嘗試和上一次失敗的嘗試之間的間隔大於屬性設定，則目前的無效嘗試會視為第一個。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first. 如果達到允許的無效嘗試次數上限之前提供有效的密碼解答，則會不正確的密碼解答嘗試次數設定為零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to zero. 如果允許無效的最大數目之前提供有效的密碼嘗試次數達到時，不正確的密碼嘗試次數的計數和無效的密碼解答嘗試計數設定為零。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to zero. 分別保留的無效密碼嘗試次數和無效的密碼解答嘗試計數。The keeps count of invalid password attempts and invalid password-answer attempts separately. 無效的密碼嘗試會導致只嘗試密碼計數器遞增。Invalid password attempts result in only the password-attempt counter being incremented. 無效的密碼解答嘗試會導致只有密碼解答計數器遞增。Invalid password-answer attempts result in only the password-answer counter being incremented. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中使用`passwordAttemptWindow`組態區段的屬性。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the configuration section. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體，並設定`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`屬性設定為五個的無效嘗試和`passwordAttemptWindow`30 分鐘的時間。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: 取得可指出在 SQL Server 成員資格資料庫中用來儲存密碼之格式的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server membership database.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指出在 SQL Server 資料庫中用來儲存密碼之格式。

span.span: One of the values, indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Hashed`僅`Clear`和`Encrypted`不安全。Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure. `Hashed` 密碼已雜湊使用單向雜湊演算法和隨機產生的 salt 值儲存在資料庫時。`Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database. 密碼驗證時，它會雜湊驗證的資料庫中的 salt 值。When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification. 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. `Encrypted` 密碼不視為安全的會顯示您的資料庫內容的入侵也可以公開加密金鑰。`Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key. 這表示您已加密的密碼無法解密和公開。This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed. ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的區段中指定值。The value is specified in the section of the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. `Encrypted` 和`Hashed`加密或根據您的組態中的項目中所提供的資訊的預設雜湊密碼。`Encrypted` and `Hashed` passwords are encrypted or hashed by default based on information supplied in the element in your configuration. 請注意，如果您指定的值`3DES`for`validation`屬性，或如果未不指定任何值，雜湊的密碼會雜湊使用演算法。Note that if you specify a value of `3DES` for the `validation` attribute, or if no value is specified, hashed passwords will be hashed using the algorithm. 可以使用來定義自訂的雜湊演算法`hashAlgorithmType`的屬性[項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。A custom hash algorithm can be defined using the `hashAlgorithmType` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. 如果您選擇加密時，預設的密碼加密會使用 AES。If you choose encryption, default password encryption uses AES. 您可以設定來變更加密演算法`decryption`組態項目的屬性。You can change the encryption algorithm by setting the `decryption` attribute of the configuration element. 如果您要加密的密碼，您必須提供明確的值`decryptionKey`元素中的屬性。If you are encrypting passwords, you must provide an explicit value for the `decryptionKey` attribute in the element. 預設值`AutoGenerate`針對`decryptionKey`使用加密密碼與 ASP.NET 成員資格時，不支援屬性。The default value of `AutoGenerate` for the `decryptionKey` attribute is not supported when using encrypted passwords with ASP.NET Membership. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體，並將其密碼的格式設定為`Hashed`。It specifies the application's instance and sets its password format to `Hashed`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得用來評估密碼複雜度的規則運算式物件。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity for the object. 屬性設定在應用程式組態中使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性[項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例所示[項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別，以提供成員資格服務和集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性驗證的密碼是否符合下列準則的規則運算式：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - 是至少七個字元。Is at least seven characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密碼不符合這些準則，成員資格提供者不接受密碼。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要密碼問題和答案提供一層額外的安全性時擷取，或重設使用者的密碼。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when retrieving or resetting a user's password. 建立使用者名稱時，使用者可以提供一組問題和解答，稍後可用來擷取或重設遺忘的密碼。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to retrieve or reset a forgotten password. 如果屬性和屬性都`false`，值屬性無關。If the property and the property are both `false`, the value of the property is irrelevant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體，並將它設定為針對密碼重設或擷取需要有密碼解答。It specifies the application's instance and configures it to require a password answer for password reset or retrieval. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別至全新的 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中使用者的密碼重設隨機產生的值。This method is called by the class to reset the password for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config) to a new, randomly generated value. 傳回新的密碼。The new password is returned. > [!NOTE] > 藉由建立隨機密碼方法不保證傳遞中的規則運算式屬性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 不過，隨機的密碼將會符合所建立的準則和屬性。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. 方法是最常使用的時機屬性設定為`Hashed`。The method is most commonly used when the property is set to `Hashed`. 如果使用者忘記的密碼雜湊，則無法擷取的密碼。If a user forgets a password that is hashed, the password cannot be retrieved. 不過，提供者可以將密碼重設自動產生的新密碼如果使用者提供正確的密碼解答。However, the provider can reset the password to a new, automatically generated password if the user supplies the correct password answer. 如果不正確的密碼回應提供給方法中，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者遭到鎖定且無法登入，直到呼叫，以清除鎖定狀態方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供了正確的密碼解答，且使用者目前並未遭到鎖定，則會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試的內部計數器會重設為零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以呼叫直接方法首先取得的參考執行個體屬性類別。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance from the property of the class. 產生的密碼會是至少 14 個字元，或在指定的長度屬性，而且會包含在指定的非英數字元數目屬性。The generated password will be at least 14 characters long, or the length specified in the property, and will contain the number of non-alphanumeric characters specified in the property. 密碼不保證傳遞規則運算式中包含如果有指定的屬性。The password is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression contained in the property, if one is specified. 中所有參數值的開頭和尾端空白會被去除。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會重設使用者的密碼，並傳回新的、 自動產生密碼。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別來驗證使用者，以在 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中的使用者資訊。This method is called by the class to validate user information for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 成功驗證使用者，也會為目前的日期和時間在資料庫中的更新的上次活動日期和最後一個登入日期值。When a user is successfully validated, the last activity date and last sign-in date values are updated to the current date and time in the database. 如果不正確的密碼提供給方法中，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者遭到鎖定且無法登入，直到呼叫，以清除鎖定狀態方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供了正確的密碼，且使用者目前並未遭到鎖定，則內部的計數器，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試重設為零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 中所有參數值的開頭和尾端空白會被去除。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 ASP.NET 應用程式設定為使用表單驗證的登入頁面和。The following code example shows the sign-in page for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and the . 如果提供的使用者認證無效，則會向使用者顯示的訊息。If the supplied user credentials are invalid, a message is displayed to the user. 否則，使用者重新導向至原來要求的 URL 使用方法。Otherwise, the user is redirected to the originally requested URL using the method. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定的提供者做為特定提供者類型，您可以依其設定的名稱和存取它們屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type.
